thread.section_title: ADS Sports Eyewear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ADS Sports Eyewear | adseyewear.com
thread.title: Natalie
thread.title_full: ADS Sports Eyewear reviewed by Natalie

author: Natalie
title: Natalie
text: We ordered a pair of prescription sports glasses with transitional lenses for my son to wear while playing baseball. Once the order was placed I received timely communication throughout the entire process. Glasses arrived on time and were exactly what we expected. Great online ordering experience.
